= DurationCapture =

To measure time very often the {{{System.currentTimeMillis()}}} method is used to measure the time.

The [http://www.google.com/codesearch#agM0M4Gok3c/trunk/utils-apl-derived/src/main/java/org/omnaest/utils/time/DurationCapture.java&q=durationcapture%20package:http://utils-apl-derived%5C.googlecode%5C.com  DurationCapture] class is a wrapper around that which allows to store and summarize duration measurements into a full statistics.

See the [http://www.google.com/codesearch#agM0M4Gok3c/trunk/utils-apl-derived/src/test/java/org/omnaest/utils/time/DurationCaptureTest.java&q=durationcapture%20package:http://utils-apl-derived%5C.googlecode%5C.com DurationCaptureTest] for an example
